Control Name: 2.15. Ensure ASC Default policy setting 'Monitor SQL Encryption' is not 'Disabled'
Control Statement: When this setting is enabled, it recommends that encryption at rest be enabled for the Azure SQL Database, associated backups, and transaction log files. In the event of a data breach, it will not be readable
